comment.author: 32465819@N05
comment._content: And wouldn't you love to see what was goin' on before their very eyes ... down below!  Love the contemplative position of her hand and finger.  From the daffodils on the sill and the lack of a shawl we could suppose springtime?

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/32465819@N05] Springtime is what I'm thinking too, especially as the geraniums haven't started to flourish yet...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons
